Title: View Creators' Portfolios
View Creators' Portfolios: As a content production manager, I want to easily access and evaluate creators' portfolios and past work.
Unnamed: 2: Allows me to assess the quality and style of creators' work.
Unnamed: 3: Creators' profiles should include a portfolio section with samples of their past work.The platform should provide a user-friendly interface to browse and view creators' portfolios.The platform should support various media formats, such as images, videos, and audio.

Title: Business Rules: Portfolio Access
View Creators' Portfolios: Only creators who have opted to make their portfolios public will have their portfolios displayed.

Title: Scalable User Profile Storage
View Creators' Portfolios: As the number of creators and content production managers increases, the system should be able to handle the storage and retrieval of large amounts of user profile data efficiently.

Title: Horizontal Scalability for Content Evaluation
View Creators' Portfolios: To handle the increasing number of content evaluation requests, the system should be able to horizontally scale by adding more evaluation servers to distribute the load and ensure timely response.

Title: Efficient Search and Filtering
View Creators' Portfolios: As the number of creators and portfolios grows, the system should be able to perform fast and efficient search and filtering operations to allow content production managers to find relevant creators quickly.

Title: Scalable Media Storage and Streaming
View Creators' Portfolios: To support the collaboration and content production process, the system should be able to handle the storage and streaming of large media files, such as videos and high-resolution images, without performance degradation.

Title: Vertical Scalability for Sponsorship Deal Management
View Creators' Portfolios: As the number of sponsorship deals and associated data increases, the system should be able to vertically scale by adding more resources to handle the increased demand for sponsorship deal management operations.

Title: Secure User Authentication
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should implement secure user authentication mechanisms, such as multi-factor authentication, to prevent unauthorized access to creators' portfolios and sensitive information.

Title: Data Encryption
View Creators' Portfolios: All creators' portfolios and sensitive data should be encrypted both at rest and in transit to protect against unauthorized access and data breaches.

Title: Access Control
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should enforce role-based access control to ensure that only authorized content production managers can view and evaluate creators' portfolios.

Title: Secure Communication
View Creators' Portfolios: Any communication between content production managers and creators should be encrypted and authenticated to prevent eavesdropping and impersonation attacks.

Title: Protection against Malicious Content
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should have mechanisms in place to detect and prevent the upload of malicious content to creators' portfolios, ensuring the safety of users' devices and data.

Title: Data Privacy Compliance
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should comply with data privacy regulations, such as GDPR, by implementing appropriate data protection measures and obtaining user consent for data collection and processing.

Title: Intellectual Property Rights Protection
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should have mechanisms in place to protect the intellectual property rights of creators, ensuring that their content is not used without proper authorization or attribution.

Title: Transparency in Sponsorship Deals
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should provide transparency in sponsorship deals by clearly disclosing the terms, conditions, and compensation details to both creators and brands, ensuring compliance with advertising and endorsement regulations.

Title: Compliance with Payment Regulations
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should comply with payment regulations, ensuring secure and compliant financial transactions between creators, brands, and record labels, including adherence to anti-money laundering (AML) and know your customer (KYC) requirements.

Title: Age Verification and COPPA Compliance
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should implement age verification mechanisms and comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) to protect the privacy and safety of underage creators and users.

Title: Easy Access to Portfolios
View Creators' Portfolios: Content production managers should be able to easily access creators' portfolios and past work without any technical difficulties or complex navigation.

Title: Clear Presentation of Portfolios
View Creators' Portfolios: Creators' portfolios should be presented in a clear and organized manner, allowing content production managers to quickly evaluate their skills, experience, and style.

Title: Efficient Filtering and Sorting
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should provide efficient filtering and sorting options for content production managers to quickly find creators based on criteria such as genre, location, popularity, or engagement.

Title: Responsive and Fast Loading
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should be responsive and load creators' portfolios quickly, ensuring a smooth and efficient browsing experience for content production managers.

Title: Visual Representation of Work
View Creators' Portfolios: Creators' portfolios should include visual representations of their past work, such as images, videos, or audio samples, to provide content production managers with a better understanding of their capabilities.

Title: Integration with Social Media APIs
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should integrate with popular social media APIs (such as Instagram, YouTube) to fetch creators' portfolios and past work, allowing content production managers to easily access and evaluate their content.

Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should integrate with authentication and authorization services (such as OAuth) to ensure secure access to creators' portfolios, allowing only authorized content production managers to view and evaluate the content.

Title: Real-time Portfolio Updates
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should receive real-time updates from creators' portfolios, ensuring that content production managers always have the latest information about creators' past work and content.

Title: Integration with Content Management Systems
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should integrate with popular content management systems (such as WordPress, Drupal) to allow content production managers to easily import creators' portfolios and past work into their own systems for evaluation and collaboration.

Title: Scalable and Reliable API Integration
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should ensure that the integration with external APIs is scalable and reliable, allowing for a large number of concurrent requests and handling potential API failures gracefully to minimize disruptions in accessing creators' portfolios.

Title: Fast Loading of Creators' Portfolios
View Creators' Portfolios: When content production managers access creators' portfolios, the portfolios should load within 3 seconds to provide a smooth user experience.

Title: Scalability for Large Number of Creators
View Creators' Portfolios: The platform should be able to handle a large number of creators' portfolios without any significant decrease in performance, ensuring that content production managers can easily evaluate and access portfolios even as the number of creators increases.

Title: Responsive User Interface
View Creators' Portfolios: The user interface should respond quickly to user interactions, such as scrolling, filtering, and sorting, ensuring a seamless and efficient browsing experience for content production managers when viewing creators' portfolios.

Title: Efficient Search Functionality
View Creators' Portfolios: When content production managers search for specific creators or categories, search results should be displayed within 2 seconds, even during peak usage times, to provide timely and relevant information.

Title: Optimized Media Loading
View Creators' Portfolios: Media elements (images, videos) within creators' portfolios should load within 4 seconds to maintain user engagement and interest.

Title: High Availability for Portfolio Access
View Creators' Portfolios: The system should ensure high availability for content production managers to access and evaluate creators' portfolios, with a target uptime of 99.9%.

Title: Secure Access to Portfolios
View Creators' Portfolios: Access to creators' portfolios should be protected with strong authentication and authorization mechanisms to prevent unauthorized access and maintain data privacy.

Title: Fast Response Time for Portfolio Retrieval
View Creators' Portfolios: The system should provide fast response times for retrieving creators' portfolios, with a maximum response time of 2 seconds to ensure a smooth user experience.

Title: Data Integrity of Portfolios
View Creators' Portfolios: The system should ensure the integrity of creators' portfolios, preventing any unauthorized modifications or tampering of the content.

Title: Scalability for Portfolio Access
View Creators' Portfolios: The system should be able to handle a growing number of content production managers accessing creators' portfolios without performance degradation, ensuring scalability.
